text: @Hogpuddin @syl_capulet1 @IAmNor6 @Wizzyxd__ @The_Hyena_7 @BarefootedBeast @ughitsjacob Not the Devil's Advocate brigade trynna add their complacent ass nickle.

@syl_capulet1 @IAmNor6 @JustJewelsss @Wizzyxd__ @The_Hyena_7 @BarefootedBeast @ughitsjacob What happened to the days where people listened and appreciated the perspectives of others (outside much of politics)? 

Oh, social media and text interpretation ruined it.

@IAmNor6 @JustJewelsss @Wizzyxd__ @The_Hyena_7 @BarefootedBeast @ughitsjacob This is a great take, and it could apply to countless topics for which people only see their side and thus "no other person's varying experiences or thoughts matter".

@JustJewelsss @Wizzyxd__ @The_Hyena_7 @BarefootedBeast @ughitsjacob That's progress, but the question begs, who gets to determine what is right and wrong? We may find what she said wrong, but what makes anything we say more valid than her? That is what I am referring to.

@Wizzyxd__ @IAmNor6 @The_Hyena_7 @BarefootedBeast @ughitsjacob It's understandable off the bat. And it's not our job to incessantly repeat stuff like this to ignorant folks to "educate them" on their shitty takes when we have a hard enough time living. Complaining and acknowledging are not the same.
@JustJewelsss @IAmNor6 @The_Hyena_7 @BarefootedBeast @ughitsjacob Yes she was tone deaf. Let's help her understand instead of sitting and complaining

@IAmNor6 @The_Hyena_7 @BarefootedBeast @ughitsjacob Comparing becoming a director to coming out of the closet and saying you were so lonely you considered a "lesbian relationship" after your divorce ain't it point blank. Like
